actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to impose a 6-month embargo on the export of all nonferrous metals, including copper and zinc, from the United States.

summary.text: Imposes a six-month embargo on the export of all nonferrous metals, including copper and zinc, from the United States. Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce, after the close of the six month period, to permit the export of such metals if he determines that no domestic shortage exists.

titles.title: A bill to impose a 6-month embargo on the export of all nonferrous metals, including copper and zinc, from the United States.
